entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. A few flurries over southern sections this evening. Wind light except southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southwestern sections early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
